argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nvinv.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | nvinv.2 | |- G = ( +v ` U ) |
| 3 |  | nvinv.4 | |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) |
| 4 |  | nvinv.5 | |- M = ( inv ` G ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1st ` U ) = ( 1st ` U ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_nvvc | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> ( 1st ` U ) e. CVecOLD ) |
| 7 | 2 | #P_vafval | |- G = ( 1st ` ( 1st ` U ) ) |
| 8 | 3 | #P_smfval | |- S = ( 2nd ` ( 1st ` U ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 2 | #P_bafval | |- X = ran G |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9, 4 | #P_vcm | |- ( ( ( 1st ` U ) e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S A ) = ( M ` A ) ) |
| 11 | 6, 10 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S A ) = ( M ` A ) ) |
